Evansville, Indiana

TV (15 min.), results to determine
readiness to go on in Spanish
instruction. Sponsorship: SWIETVC.

Director, Graduate Studies
in Broadcasting

A book which will include consider¬
able reference to educational
broadcasting in foreign countries.

Houston, Texas

chology. " Sponsorship: National
Science Foundation.

Project." (evaluation of utiliza¬
tion of saturation TV programming
as a means of dealing with com¬
munity social problem.) Sponsor¬
ships Department of Health,
Education and Welfare.

Professor

to record class~~followed by show¬
ing film to teacher and discussing
